title: What are the direct benefits of being a politician? - Quora

response.answer_text: In which country or continent ? In some parts of the world it could make you very wealthy and provide you with a job for a lifetime if you know the right people. However, if you an honerable person it gives you the opportunity to serve your community and your country.
The benefits are directly related to the power the politician has to allocate resources. The more power and the more resources he/she has to allocate, the greater the benefits.
